title: Evelynn was hired to hunt you down and kill you
body:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/RLvlFnZIk4E/hqdefault.jpg
Whom did you anger and what did you do?

replies.body:
What do you mean? I was the one who hired her to hunt me down and kill me.
http://www.lennyfaces.net/static/og-image.png

> [{quoted}](name=Goon Platoon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=R9flAd8K,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-12T17:25:51.507+0000)
>
> What do you mean? I was the one who hired her to hunt me down and kill me.
> http://www.lennyfaces.net/static/og-image.png

Kinky.

Denied her cupcakes. She has a mean streak a mile long when she wants to.

http://orig03.deviantart.net/9d12/f/2015/289/c/b/zed_lulu_by_s2pq-d9dd5n5.png
It's me... Could have been anyone for a number of reasons

I forgot to pay child support...

http://img01.deviantart.net/dc13/i/2014/333/4/2/evelynn_safecracker___making_of_by_kukuruyoart-d8832rc.png
I can't say on account of forum policy, but it involves whipped cream, a snake, and some duct tape.
All of Piltover's Higher Ups. I have a few problems with authority and a mind for where to place the Jinx for maximum effectiveness.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I spat in her cereal. I didn't mean to, but I am now a man with limited time. also on another note, Evelynn should stop turning ivis all the time, makes it difficult to not accidently expertly launch a lugey meant for the ground into her cereal.
